content.rendered:
The stories that follow reflect our achievements over the past year and, more broadly, over the four years of our current strategic plan which is now coming to an end. Together with our governors and many partners, we are now looking towards a new future and a more inclusive Commonwealth that is truly of and for the people.

FundFinity Grants Annual Report 2020-21

excerpt.rendered: While our latest annual report focusses particularly on the past year, we also reflect on the broader achievements of our current four-year strategic period which is now close to completion.
